name: Growing Up (Joshua Day)
description:
Made in one week for the PB Game Jam 5.

Growing Up is a little puzzle-platformer about little seeds on a quest for golden watering cans. At first, your goal may seem out of reach, but these seeds have a special ability; plant one, and it will grow into a tree that other seeds can use to succeed. Can you beat all 15 levels?

Art and code is by Joshua Day. Music is by Haden Day.
